## lib-ethers-u package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BlockPolledLiquityStore](./lib-ethers-u.blockpolledliquitystore.md) | Ethers-based [LiquityStore](./lib-base-u.liquitystore.md) that updates state whenever there's a new block. |
|  [EthersLiquity](./lib-ethers-u.ethersliquity.md) | Convenience class that combines multiple interfaces of the library in one object. |
|  [EthersTransactionCancelledError](./lib-ethers-u.etherstransactioncancellederror.md) | Thrown when a transaction is cancelled or replaced by a different transaction. |
|  [EthersTransactionFailedError](./lib-ethers-u.etherstransactionfailederror.md) | Thrown by [EthersLiquity](./lib-ethers-u.ethersliquity.md) in case of transaction failure. |
|  [PopulatableEthersLiquity](./lib-ethers-u.populatableethersliquity.md) | Ethers-based implementation of [PopulatableLiquity](./lib-base-u.populatableliquity.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [PopulatedEthersLiquityTransaction](./lib-ethers-u.populatedethersliquitytransaction.md) | A transaction that has been prepared for sending. |
|  [PopulatedEthersRedemption](./lib-ethers-u.populatedethersredemption.md) | A redemption transaction that has been prepared for sending. |
|  [ReadableEthersLiquity](./lib-ethers-u.readableethersliquity.md) | Ethers-based implementation of [ReadableLiquity](./lib-base-u.readableliquity.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [SendableEthersLiquity](./lib-ethers-u.sendableethersliquity.md) | Ethers-based implementation of [SendableLiquity](./lib-base-u.sendableliquity.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [SentEthersLiquityTransaction](./lib-ethers-u.sentethersliquitytransaction.md) | A transaction that has already been sent. |
|  [UnsupportedNetworkError](./lib-ethers-u.unsupportednetworkerror.md) | Thrown when trying to connect to a network where Liquity is not deployed. |

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BlockPolledLiquityStoreExtraState](./lib-ethers-u.blockpolledliquitystoreextrastate.md) | Extra state added to [LiquityStoreState](./lib-base-u.liquitystorestate.md) by [BlockPolledLiquityStore](./lib-ethers-u.blockpolledliquitystore.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [BorrowingOperationOptionalParams](./lib-ethers-u.borrowingoperationoptionalparams.md) | Optional parameters of a transaction that borrows LUSD. |
|  [EthersCallOverrides](./lib-ethers-u.etherscalloverrides.md) | Optional parameters taken by [ReadableEthersLiquity](./lib-ethers-u.readableethersliquity.md) functions. |
|  [EthersLiquityConnection](./lib-ethers-u.ethersliquityconnection.md) | Information about a connection to the Liquity protocol. |
|  [EthersLiquityConnectionOptionalParams](./lib-ethers-u.ethersliquityconnectionoptionalparams.md) | Optional parameters of [ReadableEthersLiquity.connect()](./lib-ethers-u.readableethersliquity.connect_1.md) and [EthersLiquity.connect()](./lib-ethers-u.ethersliquity.connect_1.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [EthersLiquityWithStore](./lib-ethers-u.ethersliquitywithstore.md) | Variant of [EthersLiquity](./lib-ethers-u.ethersliquity.md) that exposes a [LiquityStore](./lib-base-u.liquitystore.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers-u.etherstransactionoverrides.md) | Optional parameters taken by [EthersLiquity](./lib-ethers-u.ethersliquity.md) transaction functions. |
|  [ReadableEthersLiquityWithStore](./lib-ethers-u.readableethersliquitywithstore.md) | Variant of [ReadableEthersLiquity](./lib-ethers-u.readableethersliquity.md) that exposes a [LiquityStore](./lib-base-u.liquitystore.md)<!-- -->. |
